name: Say Cheese
description:
Inspired by Tomska's asdfmovie series, where a city is getting attacked by aliens. An animated character screams 'Throw the CHEESE' and they start throwing cheese at the ship and nothing happens. Survive  against an Endless horde of Aliens trying to steal your cows.  You're here to throw cheese and chew gum, and you're all out of gum.
  • WASD to move
  • Left click mouse button to shoot
  • Esc to unlock your cursor
